data.description: Looking to downsize or find your new starter home? Welcome to 15 Grove Court - an absolute Gem describes this home nestled on a quiet cul-de-sac. This adorable abode boasts two bedrooms, one bathroom, and has a freshly painted interior with a brand-new roof installed in 2023! Step into the sun-drenched living room complete with a lovely bay window and newer carpeting that leads you to the light-filled kitchen featuring a custom-built hutch and cabinets. The attached mudroom offers easy access to both the private backyard oasis as well as the convenient one-car garage with pull-down attic access. Two generously sized bedrooms with hardwood floors are complemented by a full bathroom complete with a linen closet and walk-in tub equipped with jacuzzi jets for ultimate relaxation. The lower level features two additional recreational rooms boasting a dry bar and countless built-ins perfect for storage or creating your ideal entertainment space. The unfinished area on the lower level is an ideal space for you to customize the ultimate workshop for all of your projects. Take advantage of the covered, expansive patio perfect for entertaining or relaxing, surrounded by lush, perennial gardens and a majestic azalea bush. Carefree storage sheds provide ample space to conveniently store all of your gardening and landscaping essentials, completing what truly is the perfect home! Located close to the Library, Medical Facilities, Park, Public Transportation, Shopping, and more! Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity - schedule your private tour today!
